Medicine_434.News Finding: "We found that lower results on IQ tests in Swedish adolescent men are associated with a higher consumption of alcohol, measured in both terms of total intake and binge drinking," said Sjolund.
Medicine_434.Paper Finding: They found a J-shaped association between frequency of drinking and IQ test results, where the daily drinkers had the lowest IQ.
Medicine_434.News Context: "It could be the other way around for a minority of individuals, that is, when exposure to alcohol has led to cognitive impairment, but this is less likely to be found among young persons of course." "We found that lower results on IQ tests in Swedish adolescent men are associated with a higher consumption of alcohol, measured in both terms of total intake and binge drinking," said Sjolund. "It may be that a higher IQ results in healthier lifestyle choices.
Medicine_434.Paper Context: It should be noted that the authors report a skewed study population with regard to low socioeconomic position . They found a J-shaped association between frequency of drinking and IQ test results, where the daily drinkers had the lowest IQ. A higher IQ was associated with being a rare, an occasional, and a moderate drinker, whereas there was a lower IQ for being a former drinker compared with being a lifetime abstainer.
Medicine_434.text:
Reported finding: "We found that lower results on IQ tests in Swedish adolescent men are associated with a higher consumption of alcohol, measured in both terms of total intake and binge drinking," said Sjolund.
Paper finding: They found a J-shaped association between frequency of drinking and IQ test results, where the daily drinkers had the lowest IQ.
Medicine_434.displayed_text:
Reported finding: "We found that lower results on IQ tests in Swedish adolescent men are associated with a higher consumption of alcohol, measured in both terms of total intake and binge drinking," said Sjolund.
Paper finding: They found a J-shaped association between frequency of drinking and IQ test results, where the daily drinkers had the lowest IQ.

Medicine_tweet_79.News Finding: Tobacco control responsible for 30% of the increase in life expectancy in US in past 50 years.
Medicine_tweet_79.Paper Finding: In women, life expectancy at age 40 years increased 5.4 years (from 37.4 to 42.7 years), but without tobacco control, it would have been projected to increase by only 3.8 years (from 37.3 to 41.2 years).
Medicine_tweet_79.News Context: Tobacco control responsible for 30% of the increase in life expectancy in US in past 50 years.
Medicine_tweet_79.Paper Context: Hence, 2.3 years (CR, 1.8-2.5) or 30% (CR, 23%-32%) of improved life expectancy for men is projected to be associated with tobacco control. In women, life expectancy at age 40 years increased 5.4 years (from 37.4 to 42.7 years), but without tobacco control, it would have been projected to increase by only 3.8 years (from 37.3 to 41.2 years). Tobacco control appears to be associated with 1.6 years (CR, 1.4-1.7) of the improvement in life expectancy for women or 29% (CR, 25%-32%) of the gain.
Medicine_tweet_79.text:
Reported finding: Tobacco control responsible for 30% of the increase in life expectancy in US in past 50 years.
Paper finding: In women, life expectancy at age 40 years increased 5.4 years (from 37.4 to 42.7 years), but without tobacco control, it would have been projected to increase by only 3.8 years (from 37.3 to 41.2 years).
Medicine_tweet_79.displayed_text:
Reported finding: Tobacco control responsible for 30% of the increase in life expectancy in US in past 50 years.
Paper finding: In women, life expectancy at age 40 years increased 5.4 years (from 37.4 to 42.7 years), but without tobacco control, it would have been projected to increase by only 3.8 years (from 37.3 to 41.2 years).

Medicine_98.News Finding:
CONCLUSIONS:

Our findings raise the prospect that the tissues harvested from equine ligaments up to 72 hours of post-mortem represent an available reservoir of specific stem cells.
Medicine_98.Paper Finding: The present work is the first, in both animal and human, to show that tissues harvested from cadaveric ligaments up to 72 hours postmortem represent an available reservoir of specific stem cell populations.
Medicine_98.News Context:
Furthermore, TEM analysis confirmed the stemness of EC-MSCs and identified some cells with a typical neuronal morphology. CONCLUSIONS:

Our findings raise the prospect that the tissues harvested from equine ligaments up to 72 hours of post-mortem represent an available reservoir of specific stem cells. EC-MSCs could be a promising alternative source for tissue engineering and stem cell therapy in equine medicine.
Medicine_98.Paper Context: Taking these observations into account, fundamental and clinical research studies are now required to investigate whether MSCs isolated from equine cadavers are suitable, abundant, and readily available to be used in future clinical applications. The present work is the first, in both animal and human, to show that tissues harvested from cadaveric ligaments up to 72 hours postmortem represent an available reservoir of specific stem cell populations. SLs were confirmed free of any damage following examination of the tissues both macroscopically and microscopically.
Medicine_98.text:
Reported finding: CONCLUSIONS: Our findings raise the prospect that the tissues harvested from equine ligaments up to 72 hours of post-mortem represent an available reservoir of specific stem cells.
Paper finding: The present work is the first, in both animal and human, to show that tissues harvested from cadaveric ligaments up to 72 hours postmortem represent an available reservoir of specific stem cell populations.
Medicine_98.displayed_text:
Reported finding: CONCLUSIONS: Our findings raise the prospect that the tissues harvested from equine ligaments up to 72 hours of post-mortem represent an available reservoir of specific stem cells.
Paper finding: The present work is the first, in both animal and human, to show that tissues harvested from cadaveric ligaments up to 72 hours postmortem represent an available reservoir of specific stem cell populations.

Medicine_16.News Finding: After removing the bark from one of the trees, he found evidence that at least three generations of emerald ash borer larvae had used the tree, and he saw several live larvae that were actively feeding.
Medicine_16.Paper Finding: Removal of bark from one of these trees yielded evidence of three generations of usage by emerald ash borer, a dead adult, and live emerald ash borer larvae.
Medicine_16.News Context: Fortunately, its damage has been limited to ash trees -- or so we thought. After removing the bark from one of the trees, he found evidence that at least three generations of emerald ash borer larvae had used the tree, and he saw several live larvae that were actively feeding. In addition, he found a dead adult that has been confirmed as emerald ash borer.
Medicine_16.Paper Context: In total, 4 of the 20 mature white fringetrees I examined over this period showed symptoms of emerald ash borer attack. Removal of bark from one of these trees yielded evidence of three generations of usage by emerald ash borer, a dead adult, and live emerald ash borer larvae. Some of the other trees I examined may have contained feeding larvae for the first time in 2014 and whose damage was not yet apparent externally.
Medicine_16.text:
Reported finding: After removing the bark from one of the trees, he found evidence that at least three generations of emerald ash borer larvae had used the tree, and he saw several live larvae that were actively feeding.
Paper finding: Removal of bark from one of these trees yielded evidence of three generations of usage by emerald ash borer, a dead adult, and live emerald ash borer larvae.
Medicine_16.displayed_text:
Reported finding: After removing the bark from one of the trees, he found evidence that at least three generations of emerald ash borer larvae had used the tree, and he saw several live larvae that were actively feeding.
Paper finding: Removal of bark from one of these trees yielded evidence of three generations of usage by emerald ash borer, a dead adult, and live emerald ash borer larvae.
